channel.title: Need help badly with server
channel.description: ok my server is proper messed up when i get a lvl to 99 it resets my acc and then when i log back in just loses connection instantly. and also i logged on to my acc got a lvl to 67 logged off then on and it was 1 then logged off and in 20 mins logged on and it was 67 again.it's as if my acc is getn reset but stil old files exist need help badly pls!!

item.title: Need help badly with server
item.dc:creator: @killa4444 killa4444
item.description:
@killa4444 wrote:

I don’t think your source is saving when you log off or basically not even saving… Look in server.java and see if it does.

Read full topic
